definitions: in a manner characterized by extreme happiness or joy

examples.text: tucked up in bed, blissfully asleep

shortDefinitions: in manner characterized by extreme happiness or joy

definitions: in a way that provides perfect happiness or great joy
shortDefinitions: in way that provides perfect happiness or great joy

definitions: in a way that shows a lack of knowledge or understanding of something bad

examples.text: I was blissfully unaware of the financial consequences
there's something to be said for being blissfully ignorant

shortDefinitions: in way characterized by a lack of knowledge or understanding of something bad
